citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:30 AM on
2/21/24.
The inspector arrived at 10:30 AM on 2/21/24 to conduct an inspection. The inspector contacted the designated facility
representative by phone and text upon arrival and learned that the facility representative was at a distant off-site location
and could not be available until much later in the day. An AWA compliance inspection could not be conducted because
there was no other authorized facility representative available to accompany the inspector.
Unannounced inspections are used to evaluate compliance with the AWA Regulations and Standards. This is the FIRST
attempted inspection of the Licensee.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:30 AM on 
2/21/24. 
 
The inspector arrived at 10:30 AM on 2/21/24 to conduct an inspection. The inspector contacted the designated facility 
representative by phone and text upon arrival and learned that the facility representative was at a distant off-site location 
and could not be available until much later in the day. An AWA compliance inspection could not be conducted because 
there was no other authorized facility representative available to accompany the inspector.  
 
Unannounced inspections are used to evaluate compliance with the AWA Regulations and Standards. This is the FIRST 
attempted inspection of the Licensee. 
 
 
End Section
